description.displayText: We have hired Rebecca many times to sit for my mother who is in her 80's and has dementia. Rebecca is always punctual and dependable. She follows instructions well and if she every has a question she doesn't take things for granted and she contacts us right away. She is respectful of our home, and even goes above and beyond doing some light cleaning while there. She also feeds our cat while we are out of away. She has sat for us on Weekend days, and for multiple 24hr periods when we went out of town.  She is very considerate and caring and we would recommend her.
description.originalText: We have hired Rebecca many times to sit for my mother who is in her 80's and has dementia. Rebecca is always punctual and dependable. She follows instructions well and if she every has a question she doesn't take things for granted and she contacts us right away. She is respectful of our home, and even goes above and beyond doing some light cleaning while there. She also feeds our cat while we are out of away. She has sat for us on Weekend days, and for multiple 24hr periods when we went out of town.  She is very considerate and caring and we would recommend her.

description.displayText:
Rebecca has sat for our 83 year old mom on several occasions including a few overnights and multi-day short vacations. She is very punctual and caring and dependable. She ensures our pet is fed when we are away as well, and usually does some light housekeeping. 

She treats both us and our home with respect, and she provides thoughtful and compassionate care for our aging loved one. I would not hesitate to recommend Rebecca to care for your loved one.
